title: bug? not being able to click anything.
body:
i went to a solo queue blind pick game to just play a casual game
for some reason everything looked blurry like this:

http://i.imgur.com/oqBwdcl.png

then eventually the game got disbanded because I didnt pick ( I couldn't pick because I was not able to click anything)
and it went back to the home screen, but everything was still weird and blurry.

the bug or w/e started as soon as I went into champion select 

http://i.imgur.com/23KHMtJ.png

still was not able to click ANYTHING, not even close the game.
ended up having to use task manager to close it.

rito plis fix
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: I lost my series because of it, can we get.. anything back? :l
Also wondering if we will get back lost LP, or new chances at a series if we got hit with this bug.  Thanks!
I had the same issue of being unable to interact with the client and it becoming grayed-out, but in the post-game chat, right after reporting an afk.
Thanks guys! We all appreciate the work you're putting in to fix it in a timely manner.
Yeeeeeeeah, I've lost some LP and now have a 15 minute wait time due to it happening more than once. Any chance I can at least get the LP back?
Will i get banned if i try again? Im on a 30 minute leaverbuster queue

Any guess time you guys have? Would we have to restart our game?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Hopefully it'll be fixed by tomorrow, but we can't be sure (fix might fail in testing, might be unable to hotfix for other reasons, etc.). You'll have to download a small patch to get the fix, so yeah you'll need to restart.
This is also happening on the LAN server :c
The fix will be for all regions (it's everywhereeeeee)
Yes i just had this happen and lost a promo as a result

It is harsh and unforgiving road
to fight off the shpagetti code
I lost promos because of this. Do i get a refund?

the problem now is. every time the bug went out. you can only quit the game for solving the issue. since most time the bug happens at champ selection, i am treated as a leaver and get banned. any solution for this?
happened to me too while in promos. so therefor i lost promos because of it

> [{quoted}](name=BionicBunny,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=cxB0ftEf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-14T17:52:21.070+0000)
>
> happened to me too while in promos. so therefor i lost promos because of it
SEASON 6 IS ALREADY GOING TO START OFF TO A GREAT START{{champion:222}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:222}}
Had the same thing
This happened twice to me today :/ PLEASE FIX!

Why in the world is leaverbuster still active right now, this is insane. Getting penalized for literally not doing anything you could control is ridiculous. How hard it is to disable leaverbuster for a few hours?!?!?!?

is pbe not doing their job?
there is a reason pbe exists and i don't understand why this is happening...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

As a PBE member, I can agree that a lot of the people are not cooperating or reporting bugs as much as they used to be. 

Lately everyone in PBE now only has the “LET ME PLAY THE NEW CHAMP OR FEED” attitude. And that’s if you can even get into a game in the first place. 

I actually stopped playing on PBE because it’s been like this for such a long time and it has been making me cautious of logging on again. And Riot can’t do anything to fix this because the damage has already been done.
I think the alpha will solve most of these problems, it'll basically be what the PBE should have been.
all i wanted to do was do an ai game. now im waiting an hour. yay... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
This is a wonderful game right?

This has happened to me twice now. Went to play some more ranked with a team and had to dodge because i couldnt fucking pick a champ. Now im waiting AN HOUR!!!!!!!!! Lost lp and have to wait to play anything on league. So beyond frustrated right now. Patches FTW. . . . . . . .{{item:3070}}
I've had the same problem, hope yall fix it soon {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Got the same thing. Had a 5min penalty ._.

On a vs AI.
Same problem here! RIOT FIX THIS    Tired of waiting after leaving game from not selecting champion!!!!!!!
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/d13o4z7Q-oce-patch-61-bugs-needs-fix
This happened to me twice, and once for my friend
This bug happens as soon as i buy bonus xp and cant go into games :(
I've been having this same issue all night! Seems like a lot of people are having the same problem cause I keep joining games that get disbanded because a player can't pick a champion.
Yea!!! a 20 min wait for 5 matches for accepting the game invite!!! LeaveBuster FTW!!! :( (riot ........ not a happy camper you have made.
Just happened to me too, two different matches, which then ultimately forced me to wait in a queue for 15 minutes. My teammates are not pleased, and neither am I. :c

Yea I logged in and one game went well. The next I queued in, it came time for me to pick, I switched my summoner spell to exhaust and bam gray wall! Had to dodge. It was my first time so I hope I won't get time restricted but I possibly might. It's been an hour since they said they were working on it so I hope it will be fixed soon.

Happended to me three times now.
happens sometimes randomly and all the time when i change my spells or skin.
 pls fix
Just happened to me as well
Same bug happened to me several times today, super annoying. Forces dodge.

Same
 rito plz fix
wtf,are you kidding me.This company can you repair the bug. I really hate this bug I do not want to play this game any more.fuck
Girlfriend had this exact problem 2 days ago. Champ select was fine, but it happened in-game.

Same thing happened to me was able to screen record it right after it happened. Not sure how much info it gives but I also opened task manager and showed current resources and apps. 

https://youtu.be/OuP_YWQm1NA

**Really annoying because I have never gotten a timer for dodging in the 3+ years of playing **
Well it made me dodge guess ima get a 5 minute penalty, its not fair that we do because of some bug
This Happen to me during a rank game

https://gyazo.com/46f69d560dbe0710379314c2e63afe4f

just happened to me
